== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
var1: no    # a first variable
var2:
  description: a second variable
  test:
    - test
  default: non
var3:
  description: a third variable
  test:
    - test
----
== dictionaries/rougail/10-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
var1:
  redefine: true
  test:
    - test1
var2:
  redefine: true
  test:
    - test1
var3:
  redefine: true
  test:
----
